Pontypool Community Council presents...

Pontypool
Party In
The Park

PONTYPOOL PARK | Saturday 12th July | FREE ADMISSION

What's On Register Contact

Our annual summer party
just got a whole lot bigger!

Pontypool Party in the Park is the summer's hottest ticket! Join us for a day of fantastic live music across multiple stages, delicious food from local vendors, and fun for the whole family. Kids' activities, market stalls, and a vibrant atmosphere guarantee a memorable day.

All included with Free Admission!

Entertainment

Amazing live music from local favourites to big-name headliners across multiple stages. Get ready to dance the day away!

More Details
Food & Drink

Savour street food delights and refreshing drinks! From gourmet burgers to tasty treats, we've got your cravings covered!

More Details
Gifts & Stalls

Discover unique gifts and toys at our vibrant market stalls. Browse handcrafted treasures and perfect presents for all ages.

More Details
Facilities

Clean, accessible toilets and handwashing facilities available throughout the event. First aid on site for your peace of mind.

More Details
Follow us on Social Media for all the latest news and updates!

 ENTERTAINMENT

Get ready for a sonic explosion! Experience an incredible lineup of live music across multiple stages. From exciting local bands to chart-topping headliners, there's something for everyone. Discover new favourites, sing along to anthems, and create unforgettable memories. Prepare for a day of non-stop musical entertainment!

With Performances By...

Goldie Looking Chain

Newport's finest, Goldie Lookin Chain, are back! Original gangsters of Welsh hip-hop, expect hilarious rhymes, massive beats, and pure gold.

Stereophonics

Welsh rockers Stereophonics deliver anthemic indie rock. Distinctive vocals and powerful riffs have made them a stadium-filling favourite.

Cerys Matthews

From Catatonia's fiery frontwoman to solo star, Cerys Matthews' eclectic voice and captivating presence blend folk, world, and indie influences.

Ruth Jones

Ruth Jones: Soulful Welsh singer-songwriter. Her warm vocals and honest lyrics tell stories of life, love, and laughter. A voice that resonates.

Register for News and Event Updates! REGISTER

 Food & Drink

Foodies rejoice! A delicious array of street food stalls will be serving up tasty treats. From gourmet burgers and wood-fired pizzas to vegan delights and sweet treats, there's something to satisfy every craving. Licensed bars will also be available!

Ponty Pies: A local legend, baking fresh pies daily. From classic steak and ale to our famous creamy chicken, there's a Ponty Pie for everyone. Savour the fantastic flavour,experience the tradition and get stuck in!

  • * Made with fresh, local ingredients.
  • * Pies that taste homemade.
  • * Sweet and savory pies available.

Get in touch

Download Menu

Bangin' Burgers: Serving up juicy, gourmet burgers with creative toppings and flavour combinations. Our patties are made fresh daily, and our sauces are legendary. Get your bang on! The ultimate burger experience awaits.

  • * Plump, juicy patties for maximum flavor.
  • * Build your dream burger!
  • * Try our mystery special sauce.

Get in touch

Download Menu

Cheers Beers: Discover your new favourite craft beer! We sell a diverse range of continental beers bursting with flavour, from hoppy IPAs and rich stouts to crisp lagers and fruity ales. Cheers to good times!

  • * Fresh selection of craft beers on draft.
  • * Showcasing the best brews in Europe.
  • * Experts ready to serve your perfect pint.

Get in touch

Download Menu

 Gifts & Stalls

Looking for something special? Explore our diverse market stalls brimming with unique gifts and toys. Discover handcrafted treasures, quirky novelties, and perfect presents for all ages. Find that special something to commemorate the day!

Gorgeous Gifts: Discover unique treasures and delightful presents for every occasion. From handcrafted jewellery and quirky homeware to fun toys and beautiful accessories, we've got something for everyone!

  • * Gifts and toys for every occasion.
  • * Items you won't see anywhere else..
  • * Gift wrapping available.

Get in touch

LLL at Home: Discover stylish and affordable homeware to transform your house into a haven. Explore unique furniture, beautiful textiles, and quirky decor to express your personal style and create a space you'll love.

  • * Eco-friendly and ethically sourced.
  • * Stylish pieces for any living space.
  • * Create your dream home.

Get in touch

Noam's Garden: Cultivate your dream garden! We offer a wide selection of plants, tools, and stylish accessories. From seeds and bulbs to pots and ornaments, find everything you need to create your perfect green oasis.

  • * Tools built to withstand the elements.
  • * Designed for both beauty and function.
  • * Supporting sustainable practices.

Get in touch

Register to be a Performer or Supplier in 2026! REGISTER

Facilities

Your health and hygiene are our priority at Pontypool Party in the Park! We've got dedicated on-site medical professionals, comprehensive first aid services, and accessible toilets with handwashing facilities. Enjoy the party knowing we've got you covered!

Toilets

Enjoy clean, accessible toilets conveniently located throughout the park. We've got ample facilities to ensure your comfort all day long!

Medical

Dedicated medical professionals and comprehensive first aid services are available on-site, ensuring prompt assistance should you need it.

Rest & Relax

Recharge in our designated rest areas. We've provided comfortable spaces for you to enjoy the event at your own pace.

Meeting Point

Lost or separated? Our clearly marked meeting point provides a central hub for reuniting with friends and family.

Registration
